original_text: ‘My servants, descendants of Jacob, do not be afraid. 46: Jacob was the ancestor of the nation, Israel. The Israelites were descendants of Jacob. People of Israel, do not be upset. You have been prisoners in countries far away. But I will rescue you and your descendants. You will return to your own land and you will live in peace. Jacob's descendants will be safe and nobody will make them afraid. ‘My servants, descendants of Jacob, do not be afraid. 46: Jacob was the ancestor of the nation, Israel. The Israelites were descendants of Jacob. People of Israel, do not be upset. You have been prisoners in countries far away. But I will rescue you and your descendants. You will return to your own land and you will live in peace. Jacob's descendants will be safe and nobody will make them afraid. ‘My servants, descendants of Jacob, do not be afraid. 46: Jacob was the ancestor of the nation, Israel. The Israelites were descendants of Jacob. People of Israel, do not be upset. You have been prisoners in countries far away. But I will rescue you and your descendants. You will return to your own land and you will live in peace. Jacob's descendants will be safe and nobody will make them afraid. ‘My servants, descendants of Jacob, do not be afraid.
korean_text: 내 종 야곱아 두려워하지 말라 이스라엘아 놀라지 말라 보라 내가 너를 먼 곳에서 구원하며 네 자손을 포로된 땅에서 구원하리니 야곱이 돌아와서 평안하며 걱정 없이 살게 될 것이라 그를 두렵게 할 자 없으리라

sentences.original_text: Jacob was the ancestor of the nation, Israel
The Israelites were descendants of Jacob
People of Israel, do not be upset
You have been prisoners in countries far away
But I will rescue you and your descendants
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 내가 너희와 너희 자손을 구원하겠다

sentences.original_text: You will return to your own land
and you will live in peace
and nobody will make them afraid
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 아무도 그들을 두렵게 하지 않을 것이다
